alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and northeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden and northern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/... At 144 PM EDT/1244 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Blountstown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Greensboro, Gretna, Bristol, Rock Bluff, Ocheesee, Juniper, Douglas City, Selman, Mount Pleasant, Hosford, Rosedale, Henderson Mill, Kennys Mill, Hardaway, Nettle Ridge, Sycamore, Lowry, Macedonia and Torreya State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
